author: jorton
msg: Fix parsing of Allow/Deny rules using IP addresses without a netmask;
issue is known to affect only big-endian 64-bit platforms; on affected
platforms such rules would never produce matches.

author: bnicholes
msg: Add the ssl_var_lookup() optional function to the  mod_nw_ssl module for Netware

author: bnicholes
msg: Add the ssl_is_https() and ssl_var_lookup() optional functions to the  mod_nw_ssl module for Netware

author: bnicholes
msg: Allow make files to create a cc.opt compiler options file per NLM rather than a single file per directory

author: bnicholes
msg: Add the include path to modules/ssl to resolve the include of mod_ssl.h
